documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet / inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 1, 2019. It includes official out-count forms, inmate rosters, and count slips, which are routine prison population tracking documents. The significance lies in the date, as it is the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death, and the documents show standard prison operations and inmate assignments, including one roster listing Epstein by name.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Listed by name on an inmate roster (REG NO 76318-054) with an assignment code, indicating he was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Rosters
events.description: Routine administrative counts and inmate roster updates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 1, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on July 31, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed by name on an inmate roster (REG NO 76318-054) with an assignment code of '204-206LAD' and category 'ATTY'.
The forms are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative documents for tracking inmate population counts and assignments.
Multiple out-count forms and rosters show the routine operational procedures of the MCC, including counts by housing unit (e.g., B-A, C-A, K-N).
One roster includes a category 'FS PM SUICIDE OR', which may relate to special watch or monitoring protocols.
